entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Blue River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:56 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
